title: Chapter 1568 - The Universe Realm Immortal Rankings
body:
Chapter 1568 - The Universe Realm Immortal Rankings

Enough time to brew a cup of tea later.

Boom!

The blood-red immortal mist filling the sky dissipated.

A dazzling streak of sword qi extended thirty thousand feet into the air. A long time passed without it dissipating.

The sword qi ran the trial guardian through, and he shattered into a rain of light.

Su Yi rubbed his left cheek. It was bleeding. It was just a minor flesh wound, but it was still an injury.

“He was a bit stronger than the first trial guardian. Truly not bad.” Su Yi had yet to get his fill.

After absorbing the rain of light, Su Yi’s cultivation base didn’t just fully recover. It even advanced, breaking into the mid-stage Cloud Soaring Realm!

This transformation brought with it new power. Su Yi’s will to fight intensified, and he was eager for an opponent to test himself against.

Thus, when he entered the third-floor hall, he couldn’t be bothered to check his ranking. He just proceeded straight to the next trial.

The third battleground was blanketed in thunder and lightning that intimidated and influenced the soul, and the guardian was far stronger than in the second trial.

Furthermore,...
original_title: Chapter 1568 - The Universe Realm Immortal Rankings
